attributes.action: Set the number of demonstrators required to force parliament to debate a subject
attributes.background: There have been many large demonstrations in the last two years and they tend to be ignored by parliament. For peaceful protest to continue to be a mechanism for informing parliament of your concerns/demands, there should be a set number of demonstrators required to automatically trigger a debate.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

Parliament already considers all petitions which reach 100,000 signatures for debate. 

We aren't sure what further action you'd like the Government or Parliament to take. 

You might like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/255587
